entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Fog patches developing early this evening and dissipating before morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:36 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 70%
